body: Took me ten minutes to read, and I gotta say all of the despair surrounding this series is unwarranted. Essentially, the dude got brainwashed to the point of... that. Can't say I feel bad for the dude, in the slightest. He was in public multiple times to get help, but didn't. He was only a captive for a few days. He had an open drink next to people he couldn't trust (date r@pe straws and coasters are a thing, guys, or drink something with a cap.) It's so unbelievable that the only explanation is that the dude wanted this on some level.
I thought this was straight baby play, and not for me, but these comments filled with despair are forcing me to find part 1 and read this now. If I don't come back, I probably just dropped it.
Is fourth is coming out yet?
I don't understand what was author thinking when drawing these stuffs

I want to say only one thing. This is not even a gore, nor it contains violence. But one thing that is has. That is this will make you cry. I am thinking what he is thinking right now. What he envisioned in life it all started with just joining a club  and what has it come to. Perhaps he thinks what will happen from now on. His life is all destroyed. I was left this Void thing from reading this. Yes he could've escaped but let's for the sake for plot he couldn't. Same thing would have happened and my questions still unanswered

I came here to fap and now I'm in literal fucking tears. Just the moment Chika sees her old friend, and briefly remembers what they used to be, and how they're spanked for speaking up, and just mind-numbingly accepts it all. I literally can't anymore. This is genuinely worse than a lot of BDSM doujins with the psychological horror here. The writers really outdid themselves with this one.
Bruh... I'm feeling real bad for him and he's not even real.
Uhh, this isn't heaven
I'm feeling really bad for him...  poor guy
rickm27 you stole my words
Why the fuck did i read all of these lol
Also known as the "that time I got kidnapped and did absolutely nothing about it" series. Seriously, what the fuck?

I've read a few other like this so it doesn't hit that hard

"Once the post nut clarity hits I'll regret this" It didn't, I didn't. I am on the verge of tears wondering where I went so wrong, I am literally down so bad became seriously Jealous of Chika-chan, why, why. I am seriously contemplating taking my own life. I have an amazing relationship with my parents, I did well In school, why am I like this, this stupid fucking porno comic is giving me a mental breakdown. Was my life too good? Is that why I want to be emotionally manipulated, abused and degraded.
Post nut clarity is strong with this one. Well damn I guess I have to live with it now.
how do you fuckers even nut to this there's like no porn its just wierd as hell
I feel bad for him. (Even though I kind of following this series, it's still feels fucked up) Not a hentai but still an okay doujin.
This hentai doujinshi serial would have been better if the main protagonist is a girl not a femboy, oh well can't stop flapping to this.
This is just sad .... don’t you have any dignity
shit's fucked up man, but what's more fucked up is that i ejaculated to this.
I already ejaculated twice and still haven't finished reading, holy fuck it's better than i thought thanks for the translation
